title: Think my honor level is bugged?
body: Not sure why but my account has been permanently stuck at honor level 3 for about 2 months now and i have no idea why. I havent been banned and i play a ton of games and get honor frequently and the level wont budge. There are people on my friends list with less games and less honors then me at honor level 5 which is really strange to me. Can someone help me out with this and tell me whats going on?

replies.body: Hey I took a look into this for you, and I wasn't able to see any issues.  Your Honor is active and growing!  I know it can get confusing without a visible meter, but you are making progress!  Keep at it!

Can you please take a look if mine is making any progress too ? Ever since it came out i've been playing and I have gotten way more honors than my friends who are honor lvl 5 even they say it too but I'm still honor level 2 :(
DO you mind looking at mine i dont understand how mine is still at level 2
